body:
$BABA  I dont care how much good news is out there Sentiment & group think can not stop a stock from taking a hit on a day like this. 
 
Don't take it personally, its not   
$jd $bb $amzn $aapl

$AAPL  
 
AAPl Happy Friday everyone - take a step back, relax and enjoy the weekend. I know it's been a rough trading week but have to keep things in perspective.  
 
Still seeing a strong trend across social - good momentum. Going to keep and eye on the "whale" accounts. You can check out teh trend for the last 24 and 72 hrs. Should be interesting to see over the weekend.

body: $AAPL  just keep holding
$QQQ $UVXY $AAPL You don't like Trump (who's not a true Republican) and u say 'better dead than red', hmm...

symbols.title: ProShares Trust Ultra VIX Short-Term Futures ETF

message.body: $BA $AMZN $QQQ $SPY Red is Dead. All the result of Trumps printing 50% more national debt out of thin air and fools borrowing money to buy on margin. He increases our  debt by 8 trillion and not one project to improve infrastructure, services or jobs. Just pump the market because that was his only gauge of success and he didn’t give a crap about how he pumped it. After all going bankrupt 7xs  in business is a compelling argument for electing a nut case President. And Bloomberg reports he basically bankrupted the treasury. THE US Treasury is insolvent. Biden didn’t get a penny from Congress because Trump painted the Treasury into a corner. They can’t print and pump. This was Trumps going away gift to fools like you who have zero education in economics and don’t understand what a travesty he brought upon our treasury. Insolvency is simply bankruptcy wo the legal documents. But w 7 bankruptcies notched  u you know becoming president was the opportunity for his Opus. Better dead than red.

$SHOP $TSLA $AMZN $AAPL 

Waiting for the FED rate increase — 
It will shave another 10-15%
$AAPL Dan Niles FYI Apple isn’t only smartphones, Have u tried to use a Macbook Pro or Imac?? Or Ipad or Apple watch , Airpods??
$AAPL not your beloved Apple

$SPY $BTC.X $tsla $aapl who has been here trading or doing business like me, back in 2008-2010? I’ve learned one thing on a crisis- cash is king. Nothing else. Have a cash pillow. Now that all will go bk, I’ll buy their businesses for pennies on the dollar. Current generation of tik tok btd traders has never seen a crisis.. and well.. most won’t make it out. I didn’t become rich but I stayed afloat which is better than 85% of traders.
$AAPL nah Dan Niles is legit

message.body: $AAPL Apple hater on CNBC, boy he looks like a CROOK!

body: $AAPL  🍏 Shock:  CNBC:  Dan Niles, says Technicals led him to consider that Today may have been the Mkt Bottom. And, he bought “some” Today.  Also, says he Closed some of his Shorts this Week.
$AAPL Apple hater on CNBC, boy he looks like a CROOK!
$SPY Next week it will be $AAPL $MSFT and $GOOG pulling down the market . This week it was NFLX

$SPY Last year I was discussing often about the problem w/  
$BTC.X & how if it fell it was going to affect the Market just from Margin Calls, it has. $AAPL held up today ok considering the BTC drop.  
  
We knew Jan was going to be ugly, we knew tax loss deferment was why 2021 ended the way it did & why we have selling now so the Market move does make sense.  
  
Sometimes its just using common sense w/out the need to get into the weeds. When $NFLX came out saying they would raise fees a week before their ER how could anyone think that was a good sign going into Earnings? yet some were still buying & got upset when I posted this  
 
$qqq
$AAPL if you haven't bought during this ULTRA fear, your loss babies x
@Trading__Places @MrUnreal Based on future growth and profitability $AMZN is the cheapest FAANG by a longshot. $AAPL and $MSFT are great shorts at these levels.
$AAPL how does who voted for joe like the...
